name: Eco-efficiency in the agricultural landscape of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany

author.name: Stefan Seifert
author.affiliation: University of Göttingen, Department of Agricultural Economics and Rural Development, Platz der Göttinger Sieben 5, 37073 Göttingen, Germany

author.name: Saskia Wolff
author.affiliation: Humboldt-Universität Berlin, Unter den Linden 6, 10099 Berlin, Germany

author.name: Silke Hüttel
author.affiliation: University of Bonn, Faculty of Agriculture, Meckenheimer Allee 174, 53115 Bonn, Germany

abstract: The study investigates the eco-efficiency of agricultural landscapes in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany, using spatially explicit data to analyze ecosystem functionality and economic output. The research identifies improvement potentials in ecological dimensions and suggests policy applications.
subject: Agricultural Economics
Environmental Science
citation: Seifert, S., Wolff, S., & Hüttel, S. (2024). Eco-efficiency in the agricultural landscape of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. Agricultural Systems, 220, 104062. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.agsy.2024.104062

dataset.name: Integrated Administration and Control System (IACS) Data
dataset.description: Spatially explicit land cover data used to describe landscape composition and configuration in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
